title: Kivy 1.11.0 released!
description: 200 Pull Requests merged
607 commits
477 files changed, 11262 insertions, 10102 deletions

title: Morse Code Jam
description: Winner of the Python Discord Code Jam VI!.
A morse code app, allowing you to decode, encode,
train your ear or your morse tapping skills, and even
to send and receive messages in morse code! The decoder
can even use your microphone to <a href='https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=GcwQwayqzTg'>
decode morse code from audio on the fly.

title: Chisel
description: Second place for the Python Discord Code Jam VI!.
Being an artist in the stone age wasn't easy.
Take you chisel and express your primal emotions
smashing a rock to create art.

title: Rex
description: Third place for the Python Discord Code Jam VI!.
Ever miss your trusty midnight commander?
Wish it time traveled to this age of multitouchand opengl?
Explore, manage directories, edit text files and view images.

title: Snu Photo Manager
description: A feature-rich photo manager with photo and video editing capabilities.
Sort photos and videos with a database, easily import files from your camera or phone.
Edit photos and videos with color adjustments, filters, rotation, cropping, and more.
Export your photos for websites, create collages, or convert your videos.

title: Learn Python Offline & IDE
description: An application to learn and experiment with Python
Read and search documentation & tutorials.
Includes an editor and offline compiler in the pro version

title: TriFusion
description: Phylogenomic data gathering, processing and visualization for everyone!
Detection and exploration of orthologs across multiple species... made easy!
Convert, manipulate and export thousands of multiple sequence alignments in a breeze

title: Meccano Rubik's Shrine
description: An electro-mecanical project to solve Rubik's cubes
using Meccano, Arduino, a Raspberry pi and Kivy

title: Métropole de Marseille
description: A custom application to present the Marseille métropole
Map with POI selection and basket, custom dynamic object menu
RstDocument used to display converted docx documents

title: Mission Pinball Framework
description: A free Python-based pinball framework used to run real pinball machines.
Allows builders and programmers to create software for their pinball machines.

title: Digital Stories
description: Collaborative interaction endeavours
using laser pointers to collectively
discover and interact on video games and movies.

title: Nie Nie
description: Casual puzzle/brain teaser with simple gameplay
Multiple game modes
Friends and global leaderboard!.

title: Gravity Ride
description: Arcade spaceship simulator
Use gravity in travel through the space
94 unique challenging levels

title: KOGNITIVO - Brain Training
description: Analyse your cognitive activity
on the basis of some short games!
See your daily and weekly productivity in graphs

title: Barly
description: Decipher all of those crazy names and
tell you which beers you’ll be glad you tried.
Beers recommendation based on your personal taste!

title: Simple Peinture
description: Kid drawing application
Undo system, one touch to change tool.
Multitouch supported!

title: Tangible Media
description: Explore data with object
Combine them for advanced visualisation.
Single or collaborative mode!

title: PyDelhi Conf 2017
description: Official App for PyDelhi Conf 2017
Used on 18-19 March 2017

title: Rocket Kite
description: Fly your rocket kite among the planets
Use gravity to your advantage, collect all checkpoints
Experience space flight in this colorful simulator

title: Particle Panda
description: Create particle effect for particle systems
used in Starling, Kivy and Cocos2d
Working on Desktop and mobile.

title: Yeco
description: Yeco is a multi touch controller for Ableton Live
Available for Windows and macOS

title: ProcessCraft
description: Commercial application for Business Process Modeling
Running on iOS, Android, and others desktop OS

title: Deflectouch
description: Multitouch game, first place of the Kivy Contest #1

title: FishLife
description: Multitouch game, second place of the Kivy Contest #1

title: memoryKivy
description: Multitouch game, third place of the Kivy Contest #1

title: TicTacTouch
description: Multitouch screen used for control a PLC hardware machine.
footer: By Dominique Burnand and Livio Conzett

title: bargenius
description: Interactive tablet menu with wine, beer, cocktail...
Clean design with cool touch interaction, on android !

title: Kaleidoscope
description: Educational project using 4 tablets and 1 table with projection.
Augmented knowledge table, that can be shared across tablet.

title: Touch Live
description: Monome-like controller implemented in Kivy.</br>
Graham is creating his own music on it.

title: Icarus Touch
description: Continuous keyboard implemented in Kivy.
Cyril is improvising over some backing tracks.
footer: Made by Cyril Stoller from Liquid Rain

title: The noBOOTH
description: Interactive touchscreen using Kivy for taking
pictures and customize the photo with some gadgets.

title: Plane White
description: Interactive white surface for discovering art exhibition.
